    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BitBucketRepository createRepository(RepoCreation options)
      Creates a new repository under the account of the currently authenticated user.
      BitBucketChangesets getChangesets(String user, String repoSlug)
      Returns the last changesets on a repository, as well as information about how many are available totally.
      BitBucketChangesets getChangesets(String user, String repoSlug, String start, int limit)
      Returns some changesets on a repository, as well as information about how many are available totally.
      BitBucketDirectory getDirectory(String user, String repoSlug, String revision, String path)
      Returns information about a known directory, including children directories and files.
      BitBucketFile getFile(String user, String repoSlug, String revision, String path)
      Returns information and actual contents (as a String) about a known file path.
      List<BitBucketUser> getFollowers(String user, String repoSlug)
      Returns the list of users following the given repository.
      BitBucketRepository getRepository(String user, String repoSlug)
      Returns the public repository that belongs to user and that has repoSlug as its technical name.
      Map<String,BitBucketChangeset> getTags(String user, String repoSlug)
      Returns a mapping between tags (keys) and changesets (values) on the given repository.
      List<BitBucketRepository> getUserRepositories()
      Returns the list of repositories for the current user.
      List<BitBucketRepository> search(String query)
      Search for public repositories whose name contains the given String.
